ComicInfo.Title: The Coming Of Turok Dinosaur Hunter
ComicInfo.Summary:
Aric returns his space to find danger on the home front?Orb Industries scientists are breeding dinosaurs! When Aric learns that the tissue samples they've cloned are only weeks, and not millions of years, old, he'll set out on a hunt for the time-lost monsters that must be leaving them behind. But he'll need help if he wants to track down these cretaceous killers!
Cast from the Lost Land at the end of Unity, Turok finds that his enemies, the bionisaurs, have also arrived in this modern age! When Aric is drawn to signals from bionisaur cyber-implants, he arrives in Colombia to meet the Dinosaur Hunter. The two men, both warriors cast out of their times, form a bond of mutual respect. And, when they violently shut down a bionisaur-part black market, Aric knows he has found a brother-in-arms!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:12:55. [Issue ID 36915]
ComicInfo.Tags: Doctor Flint,X-O Manowar [Aric],Ken Clarkson,Mon-Ark's mate,Mon-Ark,Randy Cartier,Turok
